story: Ali Helmy shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: The Pixel Factory
caption: acko.net
description: "I think a lot of mathematics is really about how you understand things in your head. It's people that did mathematics, we're not just general purpose machines, we're people. We see things, we feel things, we think of things. A lot of what I have done in my mathematical career has had to do with finâ€¦

data.message:
This is the best ever introduction to rendering!
I knew most of what was said, it's just the whole tangents part is what still confuses me, I wish he would've gave more details about the Jacobian matrix what it means! I hope he makes a sequel to these slides :D
